content.rendered:
Directed by M. Night Shyamalan.

Written by Paul Tremblay. M. Night Shyamalan. Steve Desmond.

Cast Dave Bautista .Jonathan Groff .Ben Aldridge.

Language English.

Producer Marc Bienstock. Ashley Fox. Christos V. Konstantakopoulos. Ashwin Rajan. Jeff Robinson. Steven Schneider. M. Night Shyamalan. Andreas Zoupanos Kritikos.

Production Universal Pictures. Blinding Edge Pictures. Dentsu.
